title: Introduction to Desktop app testing in Katalon Studio
description: Katalon Studio fully supports automation test for desktop apps   written in the following platforms: Universal Windows Platform   (UWP), Windows Forms (WinForms), Windows Presentation Foundation   (WPF), and Classic Windows (Win32).
